description.p1: I am a full stack developer with expertise in web development and mobile development in using react native expo.
description.p2: Started out with python based projects making use of frameworks like django and flask to build full stack applications then gradually added react to the mix.
description.p3: Over the years I have built up projects for my portfolio boosting my knowledge while stretching it futher by trying out mobile projects in react native expo.

projects.title: PROJECTS
projects.p: Most Projects with backends are hosted on servers which idles out if requests aren't made regularly, please be patient while it reboots.
